page.title: 09 Ganstead Riding School
page.content: Four pupils from Saltshouse JHS were interested in{recreation}so they visited the stables owned by Brookes. The{livery}charges range from Â£16 to Â£26 depending on the size of the horse The riding charges are Â£4 per hour. The {horses}are fed on oats, barley, sugarbeet pulp, hay and pony nuts. They drink water. Fourteen{horses}and ponies are kept there. Ten belong to the stables and four are{livery. } The basic schooling and jumping lessons are very good. When we interviewed a rider she thought the rates were fine and the facilities and atmosphere were excellent. Although a few exams. are needed for the job of a{groom},common sense is considered more important.
